name: Fencing (itch)
description:
Fight your friends in an 8-bit sized arena!

Rules

  • If you get stabbed, you lose a life (you have 4 lives)
  • Crouch avoid being stabbed (but watch your back)
  • Parry a stab by stabbing back
  • Score a point by killing another player
  • Lose a point by dying
  • The player with the most points wins

Player 1 controls:

  • Arrow keys to move and crouch
  • M to jump
  • N to stab

Player 2 controls:

  • F: move right, S: move left, D: crouch
  • A to jump
  • Left-Shift to stab

Gamepads are recommended, and they are required to play with more than two players.
